description: A delicious and easy no cook vegan dinner!
name: Guacamole Pita Pizzas + Recipe Video
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon salt, or more if desired
Suggested toppings: black beans, corn, tomato, radish, cilantro, jalape√±o, hot sauce, nutritional yeast

recipeInstructions.text: Add avocado, lime juice, garlic, nutritional yeast, cumin and salt to a food processor and blend until smooth, about 1 minute.
Spread 1/4 of the guacamole onto each pita (you can use more or less if desired) and then top with your favorite toppings.

video.description: How to make Guacamole Pita Pizzas - These Guacamole Pita Pizzas are a quick, easy and delicious no-cook vegan meal!  They're perfect when you want a healthy meal but don't want to cook very much!
video.name: Guacamole Pita Pizzas
